title: Ali Alchagirov
text:
Ali Magomedovich Alchagirov (; born 29 June 1966) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and former player. He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> in 1982 for <a href="PFC%20Spartak%20Nalchik">PFC Spartak Nalchik</a>.
European club competitions.
With <a href="FC%20Alania%20Vladikavkaz">FC Alania Vladikavkaz</a>.
